meanings.definition: A cylindrical carbon molecule with a hollow structure, also known as a carbon nanotube.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the buckytubes under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: The buckytubes were used to enhance the strength of the material.
meanings.sent3: The buckytubes decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The buckytubes stood tall and strong, like tiny skyscrapers in the nanoworld.
meanings.sent5: In the lab, the buckytubes gleamed like tiny black diamonds.

meanings.definition: Tubes made of carbon atoms arranged in a cylindrical structure, exhibiting unique properties such as high strength and conductivity.
meanings.sent1: The buckytubes conducted electricity better than any other material.
meanings.sent2: Researchers were amazed by the properties of the buckytubes.
meanings.sent3: The buckytubes threw a party to celebrate their conductivity.
meanings.sent4: The buckytubes were as strong as steel, yet as light as a feather.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the buckytubes danced like tiny carbon snakes.
